Dev Careers Meetup

We're holding a meetup on Sunday, Nov 15 at 3pm to help you learn more about developer opportunities and visa process in Singapore. You can also participate in 3min speed interviews with some of the coolest companies in town.

This meetup is enabled by

Check out the Meetup!

These companies are hiring!

Javascript Developer

Piktochart team is looking for a solid Javascript developer who loves writing JavaScript from scratch. You will be creating visually appealing interfaces.

UI Developer (HTML/CSS)

We are looking to improve our web app and there's so much new interactions to implement to better the user experience. We are looking for a UI developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the science of programming.

Software Developers all levels/tech stacks

Build the world's most customer centric ecommerce and logistics company.

Core Developer - Applications

You love making things. Make gorgeous components and interfaces that are used by tens of thousands of open source developers all over the world. See your work inside successful startups, be thanked by developers at Devshop for your contributions.

3x Awesome JS Engineers

At smove, our software engineers create innovative technology to solve real world problems in the urban mobility/transportation space. We code really cool realtime “Internet of Things” systems that connect to our growing fleet of hybrid cars.

Singapore's community

Singapore is awesome to work in, and
we have a vibrant community to back it up!

Check out the community!
